DOC.brief_summary: This study wishes to compare patient satisfaction and cosmesis of two different closure methods of laparoscopic ports. One method uses tissue adhesive (Dermabond) with a deep sub-cutaneous stitch and a Band-Aid dressing. The comparison method uses a 3.o undyed vicryl transcutaneous stitch, with a Bacitracin and Tegaderm dressing.
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Controlled Trial Comparing Different Closure Methods for Laparoscopic Port Sites
DOC.criteria: gynecologic laparoscopy patients known sensitivity to tissue adhesive, antibiotic ointment
